summary: In a dreary North London flat, the site of perpetual psychological warfare, a philosophy professor visits his family after a nine-year absence, and introduces the four men, father, uncle, and two brothers, to his wife.
cast: Paul Rogers|Ian Holm|Cyril Cusack|Terence Rigby|Michael Jayston|Vivien Merchant

title: The Homecoming
